pr_title: BXC-2856 - Fix user based permissions issues

timeline.message: Make sure that the user principal is provided for most ACL checks by using getAgentPrincipal instead of getGroups. Store agent principals in the group thread store rather than regenerating on each method call. Fix NPE when accessing structure browse in admin interface with no permissions to the content root

timeline.bodyText: Not a big issue, but would a wrapper method be useful for all of these GroupsThreadStore.getAgentPrincipals().getPrincipals() calls?
timeline.author: lfarrell
